title: Crocodile Gnar
body: I know i know. The crocodile hunter was a tragic event for a lot of people. So i am not expecting this skin to be published. But it is a nice idea to think about and see how well it might turn out. Am i right? So please give me some honest feedback down below. And i will be happy to reply. {{champion:150}}

replies.body:
YES.
I WANT THIS.

I rarely spend money on League but this is something I would most certainly pay for.
They have Outback Renekton. This could be Outback Gnar.
Seems too close to dino gnar imo.
He should pull out a didgeridoo for his taunt, and instead of rings circling enemies, kookaburras fly around them
I never heard of this event, what happened?
oh the crocodile hunter, who did obviously what his name is for. Was killed by being shocked to death by stingrays
and all the money raised from this skin should go to his family :D
renekton already has this skin covered.
